tool_description: Adjusts existing reading goals based on performance data and user preferences to maintain achievable yet challenging targets.

goal_id.description: Unique identifier of the goal to adjust

adjustment_reason.description: Reason for adjustment: underperforming, overachieving, lifestyle_change, or manual

new_target_value.description: New target value if manually adjusting

auto_adjust.description: Whether to automatically calculate optimal target based on performance

error_messages: Goal not found: The specified goal_id does not exist or is not active
Invalid adjustment_reason: Must be one of 'underperforming', 'overachieving', 'lifestyle_change', or 'manual'
Invalid new_target_value: Must be a positive number when provided
Cannot adjust completed goal: Goal has already been completed or expired
Insufficient performance data: Not enough progress data to make automatic adjustments
usage: Provide goal_id and adjustment_reason to modify an existing goal. Set auto_adjust to false and provide new_target_value for manual adjustments, or let the tool calculate optimal targets automatically.

adjustment_success.description: Whether the goal adjustment was successful

adjustment_summary.description: Summary of changes made to the goal

estimated_impact.description: Expected impact of the adjustment on goal achievement
